summary.name: Front-end developer
summary.introduction: With my knowledge and skills, I'm confident that my abilities will contribute to the success of many projects company. By working collaboratively with the team, I can ensure we deliver high-quality results that meet the needs of both the company and the client

experience.introduction: Hello there! My name is Mai Nguyen. I am a Front-end developer, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work.

details.description: I have almost one year of experience building mobile financial applications with React Native
With 1+ year of experience building management systems using the company's low-code platform. I with my team successfully deployed HDBank's Back Office system on time and received high praise.
